newsitem.title: IRAN: Force 4.5 quake hits southern Iran town.
newsitem.headline: Force 4.5 quake hits southern Iran town.

text.p: An earthquake measuring 4.5 on the Richter scale hit the town of Lar in Iran's southern province of Fars on Sunday, Iran's official news agency IRNA reported.
There was no immediate word on casualties or damage in the third quake to hit the town since March, it added.
Iran has been hit by at least three major earthquakes in the past year as well as scores of tremors and thousands of aftershocks.
A force four earthquake is strong enough to cause extensive damage in a populated area.
